name: AR Chess - by BrainyChess
description:
Play the classic game of chess in immersive augmented reality. Interact with the 3D chess set, walk around the board, and experience a modern and more fluid chess experience. Whether you play against our computer at various strengths, or against a friend on your own phone, you can play back every game in augmented reality at any time.

The app also supports Fischer random gameplay, along with chess timers, allowing you to obtain the best possible experience from a chess application.
